scripts.build: yarn run samples && yarn run doc && bower update && yarn run clean && polymer build
scripts.samples: rm -rf samples/build && cd samples && yarn build
scripts.doc-analysis: rm -rf doc/analysis.json && polymer analyze --input noticeable-widget.html > doc/analysis.json
scripts.doc: yarn run doc-analysis && rm -rf doc/build && cd doc && yarn run build
scripts.package: yarn run build && mkdir -p public/v1/{samples,doc} && touch public/index.html && touch public/404.html && cp -r build/es5-bundled/* public/v1/ && mv public/v1/bower_components public/v1/libs && mkdir -p public/v1/libs/noticeable-widget && mv public/v1/*.html public/v1/libs/noticeable-widget && cp post-samples.json public/v1/libs/noticeable-widget && cp -r samples/build/es5-bundled/* public/v1/samples && cp -r doc/build/es5-bundled/* public/v1/doc && uglifyjs noticeable-widget.js --mangle --compress -o public/v1/noticeable-widget.js
